I looked at the preview while downloading it, it does not look that much like it is an upscale, but the edges were a bit pixely.  After looking at the specs on this page, the profile is baseline and there is only 1 Reference Frame!  Come on.  HD is suppose to be High Profile, Level 4.1 and for the settings, at least use the default settings.

I think the point of people complaining is that they've downloaded a 4.7GB file that is no better than a 0.7GB file.

My video card upscales, I don't need waste my time and download an extra 4GB over what I'am actually getting.

If the source is  DVD or an R5, tell us and we'll download a file that is an efficient size for that source.  Saying it's a bluray source is just not true and pisses people off so you cannot expect thanks for wasting people time and bandwidth.

Very poor.

Beware! Do not download this shitty, shitty copy. I repeat, choose another copy. That is if you do want to download this horribly awful film in the first place. The picture quality is not good, although watchable. The sound quality is very bad, it's totally distorted because it's been recorded too loud. Kind of when someone is screaming into a poorly made microphone. And last, the subtitles are very bad with misspellings and such (the English ones at least) and fucks up after about an hour and need to be delayed for a few seconds.
